RECORDING-2-1-2 START RECORDING ON RECEIVER
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that recordings list is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Create recording Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Create Recording Job Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: Action Subcode: MaxRecordingJobs Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 46 at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.ExecuteGetCommand(ParametersValidation validationRequest, GetMethodDelegate method) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 68 at DUT.CameraWebService.Recording10.RecordingService.CreateRecordingJob(RecordingJobConfiguration JobConfiguration) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceRecording10\RecordingService.asmx.cs:line 157 Max number of recording jobs exceeded. Delete one job and try again STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Get Recording Jobs Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check if there are any jobs to delete STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Delete Recording Job (jobToken = 'JobToken1') Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: NoRecordingJob Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 46 at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.ExecuteVoidCommand(ParametersValidation validationRequest, MethodDelegate method) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 80 at DUT.CameraWebService.Recording10.RecordingService.DeleteRecordingJob(String JobToken) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceRecording10\RecordingService.asmx.cs:line 169 STEP FAILED
STEP 12 - Delete recording 'recording001' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
